results.title: Lifelong treatment with atenolol decreases membrane fatty acid unsaturation and oxidative stress in heart and skeletal muscle mitochondria and improves immunity and behavior, without changing mice longevity
results.text_hl: The @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ treatment also lowered @<m>DISEASE_Intestinal_Pseudo_Obstruction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007418 @@@visceral adiposity@@@, decreased maximum mitROSp from complex I and oxidative, glycoxidative, and lipoxidative protein damage in both organs, and oxidative damage in heart mtDNA.

citations.NLM: Gómez A, Sánchez-Roman I, Gomez J, Cruces J, Mate I, Lopez-Torres M, Naudi A, Portero-Otin M, Pamplona R, De la Fuente M, Barja G. Lifelong treatment with atenolol decreases membrane fatty acid unsaturation and oxidative stress in heart and skeletal muscle mitochondria and improves immunity and behavior, without changing mice longevity Aging Cell. 2014 Jun;13(3):551-60. PMID: 24612513
